content: say hello to mabel your new favorite throw a modern twist on an old classic this pdf crochet pattern includes 13 full color pages with step by step instructions and photo tutorials you will need approx 1950 yards of vanna s choice in black and 2115 yards of big twist value in white you can substitute any worsted weight yarn of your choice 5 00mm h crochet hook and a tapestry needle gauge one granny square = 5 75 x5 75 finished size is 60 x67
